name: The Arcane Storm
languages: Any other language known by its creator

specialAbilities.name: Arcane Recovery
specialAbilities.description: On a short rest, The Arcane Storm can regain a number of spell slots equal to half their level (rounded up).

specialAbilities.name: Spellcasting
specialAbilities.description:
The Arcane Storm is a 7th-level spellcaster. Their spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). They know the following spells:
    
        Cantrips (at will): mage hand, prestidigitation, ray of frost
    
        First level (4 slots): burning hands, charm person, mage armor, shield
    
        Second level (3 slots): magic missile, misty step
    
        Third level (2 slots): fireball, haste
      }

specialAbilities.name: Arcane Storm
specialAbilities.description:
The Arcane Storm can unleash a powerful blast of arcane energy in a 30-foot radius. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 10d6 force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
    
        After using this ability, The Arcane Storm must take a short rest before using it again.

actions.name: Quarterstaff
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Fireball
actions.description:
A 20-foot-radius sphere of fire erupts from a point you choose within range. Each creature in the sphere must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 8d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A flammable object in the area that isn't being worn or carried ignites if it isn't being attended by a creature.
    
        After you cast the spell, you can create a number of motes of fire within range equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of one). Each mote is a Tiny ball of fire, about the size of a marble, that hovers in the air for 1 minute. The motes move with you if you move more than 10 feet away from them.
    
        As an action, you can hurl one of the motes at a creature within 30 feet of you. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage.
      }

actions.name: Arcane Storm
Legendary Action: Arcane Bolt
actions.description:
The Arcane Storm can use a legendary action to create a bolt of arcane energy that deals 5d6 force damage to a creature within 60 feet of it.
      }
